Title: Relates to establishing a property tax credit for class 2 cooperative and condominium buildings that are designated safe after a facade safety program inspection
Summary: Relates to establishing a property tax credit for class 2 cooperative and condominium buildings that are designated safe after a facade safety program inspection.
LawCode: Add ยง11-242.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a property tax credit for class 2 cooperative and condominium buildings that are designated safe after a facade safety program inspection
